channel.title: Dioramarama on Andrew Blance
channel.description: Recent content in Dioramarama on Andrew Blance

item.title: Dioramarama
item.description: Balthazar III Me and my flatmate have formed a terrible band who have just released an EP. It consists of 5 covers of famous songs! You can listen here! In it I play the guitar, fiddle and a keyboard. My flatmate plays the bass and theremin. We both sing and try to program drums. The EP’s tracks are presented in the reverse order in which we recorded them - meaning we recorded track 5 first.
